content.text: Match ends, Villarreal 1, Racing de Santander 1.
Second Half ends, Villarreal 1, Racing de Santander 1.
Goal!  Villarreal 1, Racing de Santander 1. Lautaro Acosta (Racing de Santander) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jairo Samperio with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Jairo Samperio (Racing de Santander) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
